description.english: Rebuild your spaceship
description.german: Baue das Raumschiff wieder auf.

description.tchinese: 重建你的太空船

description.danish: Genopbyg dit rumskib
description.brazilian: Reconstrua sua espaçonave

description.english: Enter the volcano
description.german: Betritt den Vulkan.
description.french: Entre dans le volcan !

description.spanish: ¡Entra en el volcán!

description.tchinese: 進入火山！

description.polish: Wjedź do wulkanu!
description.danish: Dyk ned i vulkanen!
description.brazilian: Entre no vulcão!

description.english: Find 15 Power Cores in Stranded in Space
description.german: Finde in der 'Gestrandet im Weltraum' 15 Energiekerne.
description.french: Trouve 15 cellules d'énergie au cours de la 'Perdus dans l'espace'
description.italian: Trova 15 nuclei d'energia nella 'Allo sbando nello spazio'
description.spanish: Encuentra 15 núcleos de potencia en el modo 'Atrapado en el espacio'
description.schinese: 在闯关模式中找到15个动能核心
description.tchinese: 在闖關模式中找到15個動能核心
description.russian: Найдите 15 энергоблоков в 'Затерянный в космосе'
description.polish: Znajdź 15 źródeł energii podczas Kosmiczny 'Rozbitek'
description.danish: Find 15 kraftkerner i 'Strandet I Rummet'
description.brazilian: Encontre 15 núcleos de energia na 'Preso no Espaço'

description.english: Get gold on Downhill Rush
description.german: Erhalte Gold beim Abfahrtsrennen.
description.french: Décroche l'or dans Descente effrénée
description.italian: Ottieni l'oro in Adrenalina in discesa
description.spanish: Consigue oro en Cuesta abajo y sin frenos.

description.tchinese: 在“向下俯衝”中獲得黃金

description.danish: Vind guld på Downhill Rush
description.brazilian: Consiga ouro em Corrida Descendente

description.italian: Ottieni l'oro nello Scivolone soleggiato
description.spanish: Consigue oro en Rampa Soleada
description.schinese: 在“阳光坡地”中获得黄金
description.tchinese: 在“陽光坡地”中獲得黃金
description.russian: Получите золото в заезде Солнечный спуск
description.polish: Zdobądź złoto na Słonecznej Zjeżdżalni
description.danish: Vind guld på Sunny Slide
description.brazilian: Consiga ouro em Escorregador Ensolarado

displayName.english: To Fly or Not To Fly
displayName.italian: Volare o non volare, questo è il dilemma

displayName.italian: Da un'isola all'altra in un sol balzo

description.english: Land on all the floating islands above Race Island in one session

description.tchinese: 在競速島上所有的浮島上降落（一局內）

description.brazilian: Pouse em todas as ilhas flutuantes sobre a Ilha da Corrida em uma sessão

displayName.spanish: Las mejores vistas de la ciudad

description.english: Break the sound barrier

description.tchinese: 飛過全部火環（一局內）

description.brazilian: Voe por dentro de todos anéis flamejantes em uma sessão

description.tchinese: 在沙盒模式中解開所有球的謎題（一局內）

description.brazilian: Termine todos os enigmas com bolas no modo Livre em uma sessão

description.english: Stay airborne in a zero Power Core vehicle for 60 seconds
description.german: Bleibe mit einem Fahr- oder Flugzeug ohne Energiekern für 60 Sekunden in der Luft.
description.french: Reste dans les airs pendant 60 secondes avec un véhicule sans aucune cellule d'énergie
description.italian: Rimani sospeso a mezz'aria in un veicolo senza nuclei d'energia per almeno 60 secondi
description.spanish: Permanece suspendido en el aire con un vehículo sin núcleos de potencia durante 60 segundos.
description.schinese: 在一个不使用动能核心的载具中滞空60秒
description.tchinese: 在一個不使用動能核心的載具中滯空60秒
description.russian: Продержитесь 60 секунд в воздухе в машине без энергоблоков
description.polish: Pozostawaj w powietrzu przez 60 sek., przebywając w pojeździe bez źródła zasilania
description.danish: Hold dig i luften i 60 sekunder i et fartøj uden kraftkerner
description.brazilian: Fique no ar por 60 segundos dentro de um veículo com nenhum núcleo de energia

description.english: Pick up a piece of Salvage with the Tractor Beam
description.german: Hebe mit dem Anziehungsstrahl ein Stück Altmaterial auf.

description.spanish: Recoge un trozo de chatarra con el dispositivo de atracción.

description.tchinese: 使用柱形拉攏器拾起回收品

description.polish: Zbierz trochę ocalałego towaru za pomocą wiązki przyciągającej
description.danish: Brug Tiltrækningsstrålen til at samle rumskrald op med
description.brazilian: Pegue um pedaço de sucata com o raio trator

description.danish: Nå toppen af Danger Island
